channel.title: Moparcraft Server [Bukkit 1.5.2] August 31, 2012
channel.description:
[center] [anchor=top] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/o9g77k.png[/img][/center] [b][size=18pt][u]Table of Contents[/u][/size][/b] [ul][li][iurl=#howtoplay]How to Play[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#therules]Current Rules[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#chestprotection]Chest Protection[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#communication]Communication[/iurl] (In-game Chat, Voice chat, IRC)[/li] [li][iurl=#worldmap]World map[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#hawkeye]Coreprotect: Griefer detection[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#tnt]TNT whitelist application[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#pvp]Player Versus Player aka The Wild[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#staff]Meet the staff team[/iurl][/li][/ul] [anchor=howtoplay][b][size=18pt][u]How to Play[/u][/size][/b] [b][u]Cracked Client[/u]:[/b] http://up.ht/r790ZR ([url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,487009.0.html]Thanks to CoonHunter[/url]) [b][u]Connection[/u]:[/b] [i]moparcraft.net[/i] [b]Port[/b]: [i]25565[/i] (default port) [b][u]Client Information:[/u] [/b] [b]Version:[/b]1.5.2 (Read below) You can connect with the paid client, however if you haven't bought the game you can still play using CoonHunters client with the link above. Before connecting to the server please make sure to set your [tt]Minecraft Name[/tt] [url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;area=forumprofile]here[/url] to the username you will be using on the server or to the name you paid for. Additionally you can also use your forum profile name. When you connect to the server, you will be prompted for a password. After joining the server all you have to do is type the command /login yourforumpassword. This password will [b]match[/b] your forum password for www.moparcraft.net/smf. If you don't feel comfortable using your forum password as your Moparcraft server password feel free to change it [url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;area=forumprofile]here[/url] in the [tt]MoparCraft Server Password[/tt] field. [anchor=therules][b][size=18pt][u]Official server rules[/u][/size][/b]
[center][b]1. Communication[/b] The forums and server are English only. If you want to speak in a different language please use the private message command. Spamming and advertising are not allowed on the server. Excessively abusive messages are not allowed. Impersonation of staff or members is not allowed. No IRL trading, for example, I'll send you $10 for X items on Moparcraft. Racism and sexism are not allowed. No profanity, or offensive messages are to be built with blocks on this server. This also counts for offensive signs and so on. [i]Failure to follow the rules in communication could result in a mute or temporary ban.[/i] [/center] [center][b]2. Land property[/b] Do not build on someone's land without their permission, own-able land is considered anything inside walls/fences/and land that was placed. (e.g floating or ocean islands) Harvesting someone else's farms without permission is not acceptable even if you replant. Don't lock chest that don't belong to you. Do NOT build structures out of LWC locks, or use them to 'protect' your structure. Do not put chickens/boats or anything on somebody elses property without their permission. Constitutes as griefing. If the person does not find this stunt funny then they can report you, so if you're going to do things like this then you are still liable to be punished if they see it as an attack. [i]Failure to follow the rules in land property constitutes as griefing and could result in a temporary ban or permanent ban.[/i] [/center] [center][b]3. Animal husbandry[/b] Do not breed an excessive amount of animals with the intentions of crashing or lagging the server. Animals owners please place your animals in such a way that allows you to see who killed them. (e.g somewhere that requires block/door edits to get in) Do not kill someone else's animals. [i]Failure to follow the rules in animal husbandry constitutes as griefing and could result in a temporary ban or permanent ban.[/i] [/center] [center][b]4. Commands & LWC[/b] Do not spam the /tpahere command. Do not build entire structures out of furnaces or chest or any other lwc enabled block. [i]Failure to follow the rules in commands & lwc could result in a temporary ban or permanent ban.[/i] [/center] [center][b]5. Client modifications[/b] Texture pack and mini-map mods are allowed (This doesn't include features of the minimap which have been disabled on the server, for example: player finders, npc finders and so on). Modifications designed to give you an unfair advantage, such as structure finders are also disallowed. Flying, Speed or x-ray type hacks are not allowed. [i]Failure to follow the rules in client modification constitutes as hacking and could result in a temporary ban or permanent ban.[/i] [/center] [center][b]6. Client/Server bugs[/b] Abusing server or client bugs to gain an unfair advantage is not allowed (Such as: duping) Certain bugs are counted as features and the staff decides on this. [i]Failure to follow the rules in client/server bugs could result in a temporary ban or permanent ban.[/i] [/center] [center][b]7. Ban evasion[/b] Evading bans is against the rules. [i]Failure to follow the rules in ban evasion could result in a longer temporary ban or permanent ban.[/i] [/center] [center][b]8. Falsifying evidence[/b] Posting purposely wrong reports or modifying evidence in any way is against the rules. [i]Failure to follow the rules in falsifying evidence could result in a temporary ban or permanent ban.[/i] [/center] [center][b]9. Staff decisions[/b] The staff does not need a report to ban you for breaking the rules if we find evidence of you breaking them, appropriate actions will be taken. [i]Even if there is a report and the reporter decides to let the defendant go that doesn't mean the staff will, we can still take appropriate actions.[/i] [/center] [center][b]How to properly make a report[/b] To make a report please post a topic in the MoparCraft Infraction Reports section [url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/board,179.0.html]http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/board,179.0.html[/url] The title of the report should include the offenders in-game name or forum name and which ever rule you believe them to have broken. Inside your post you need to include links to evidence. A example would be a screen shot of a inspect log. To use the inspect command do "/co inspect" in-game without quotations and place or click somewhere where you want to obtain evidence. Any previous changes made to where you placed the block will show up in a log. Now press f2 to take a screenshot, now Minecraft will place a screenshot in your %appdata%\.minecraft\screenshots directory on windows based machines. You can upload the pictures to any picture sharing sites. [/center] [center][b]Final thoughts[/b] The rules will change periodically and it is your responsibility to read them. The punishments listed for each rule are just a guideline. All accounts on the Moparcraft server and forums belong to moparisthebest and as such if he personally finds you breaking any rules account deletion may occur. [/center]
[anchor=chestprotection][b][size=18pt][u]Chest Protection[/u][/size][/b] This server has a plugin enabled that allows us to protect our chests. There are are many options available to you on how you want to do it, so you can protect your valuables the way you want. There are two types of protection: [ul][li]Public - Everyone has access to the chest, but only you can destroy it.[/li] [li]Private - You and people you specify (details below) have access to the chest, but only you can destroy it.[/li][/ul] [size=10pt][b]Public Protection[/b][/size] Public protection is good if you want everyone to be able to access the items in your chest , but you don't want them to be able to destroy it. The syntax for this command is: [code]/cpublic[/code] [size=10pt][b]Private Protection[/b][/size] Private protection means that only you can access the chest or destroy it. The syntax for this command is: [code]/cprivate[/code] [size=10pt][b]Other Commands[/b][/size] [b][u] Un-register your chest:[/u][/b] If you unprotect your chest, anyone can use it, or destroy it. Use with caution. The syntax for this command is: [code]/cremove[/code] Then click on your chest. [b][u]Allow others to access your chest:[/u][/b] You can give other users the ability to access your private chest by their username. [code]/cmodify[/code] Then click on the chest. [anchor=communication][b][size=18pt][u]Communication[/u][/size][/b] Communication is a big part of this game, so we want to make sure you stay connected. There are many options available to you: [ul][li]In-game chat[list][li]To talk in game, push the 't' key, type your message, and hit enter. Your chat will be displayed.[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]IRC Channel [list] [li][u][b]Channel[/b][/u]: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/irc.php?img=0&host=irc.moparisthebest.com&channel=#moparcraft]#moparcraft[/url] This channel can be used to talk about this Minecraft server.[/li][li]If you need help joining the IRC server, use [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,476984.0.html]this[/url] tutorial. Thanks to casey. Visit [url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,487019.0.html]this thread[/url] for more information.[/li] [/list] [/li][/ul] [anchor=worldmap][size=18pt][b][u]World map[/u][/b][/size] The official world map is available [url=http://www.moparcraft.net/worldmap/][b]here[/b][/url]. It shows a top-down view of the entire world map since the last update. You can toggle between day (for a clear view) and night (to see the pretty lights) on the page. It will update every early morning EST (GMT -5) [anchor=hawkeye][size=18pt][b][u]Core Protect: Griefer detection[/u][/b][/size] Core Protect is a plugin we use to catch griefers, and roll back their changes. You need to be aware of one thing though, it will NOT record changes to these blocks: # gold block, iron block, diamond block, gold ore, iron ore, diamond ore, lapiz lazuli ore, redstone ore, glowing redstone ore, clay block excluded-blocks: [41, 42, 57, 14, 15, 56, 21, 73, 74, 82] So you shouldn't use them where you care about losing them. [anchor=tnt][size=18pt][b][u]TNT whitelist[/u][/b][/size] We've got it sorted out now, I'm sure everybody will be happy to hear. If you feel you meet the criteria stated below then please feel free to apply to have TNT access, there is no application form as such you just have to post in this topic. http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,536988 The following rules must be met: [ul][li]Using it in PVP isn't allowed AT ALL[/li][li]Using it grief obviously isn't allowed.[/li][li]Do not leave it floating around placed - anyone can activate TNT, and if somebody griefs with TNT you've left placed then you'll be held responsible.[/li][li]Use your common sense when using it.[/li][li]Try to bend, and find loop holes in these rules and you'll just have your permissions removed.[/li][li]You mess the environment up, you clean it up.[/li][/ul] If we suspect you to be a risk, or you breach any of these rules we withhold the right to remove your permission to use TNT at any time we please. If you're denied the usage of TNT you will be PMed the same goes for if you're accepted. If you get denied and are unhappy about it do not spam this thread as you will be infracted, moaning won't get you reconsidered. Patience will. Just because you get denied doesn't mean we deem you untrustworthy, we have a number of variables to consider before giving anyone TNT permission so please don't linger on it :) Just because you've been denied it once, doesn't mean you cannot apply again in the future. [anchor=pvp][size=18pt][b][u]The Wild[/u][/b][/size] The griefing rule is substantially relaxed, if you're easily upset and aren't willing to have your property damaged in combat - then this isn't the area for you. Stealing from chest is allowed. Your chat in the wild has a radius of 32 blocks, you can not private message other players. Your inventory & armor along with any potion effects will be removed upon entering or leaving the wild. The border around the wild is protected from block placement and removal. So you can not build near it. Spawn killing is still not allowed e.g killing someone multiple times at their re-spawn point. You can not lock check or protect any blocks using lwc here. To enter the wild you need to use /wild then read the warning and type /wild yes. A countdown will began and after 20 seconds of not moving you will be teleported randomly into the wild. (Remember you will lose any items you have on you) [anchor=staff][size=18pt][b][u]In-Game Staff List[/u][/b][/size] [b]Administrators:[/b] [ul][li][url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=1]Moparisthebest[/url][/li] [li]Tom5001 ([url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=284102]Tom[/url])[/li] [li]xvizardx17 ([url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=101530]zuppers[/url])[/li] [li]hairypenguins ([url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile]Si Force[/url])[/li][/ul] [b]Moderators:[/b] [ul][li]Fuscate ([url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=448771]Phaze One[/url])[/li] [li]Kickingjamie ([url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=63268]kickingjamie[/url])[/li] [li]Manbearpig ([url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=147996]omgilikepie[/url])[/li][/ul] If you have any issues, pm them on the forums or contact them ingame. ~ The Staff Team

item.title: Moparcraft Server [Bukkit 1.5.2] August 31, 2012
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

marcbob:

1.5.2 bukkit was available may 3rd… so why aren’t you guys using it since it’s a stable release?

Bukkit has only released a beta build “A new CraftBukkit Beta Build (1.5.2-R0.1)” and Tom doesn’t want to use beta builds for the server. As well as that we have to wait for the plugin developers that we use to update the plugins. If Tom was willing to use the beta builds we could probably update a lot quicker.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft Server [Bukkit 1.5.2] August 31, 2012
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:27, topic:447764”][quote author=marcbob link=topic=550652.msg4305182#msg4305182 date=1369673981]
1.5.2 bukkit was available may 3rd… so why aren’t you guys using it since it’s a stable release?
[/quote]Because MoparCraft is dead, why do you think they moved it back to MPSC? :P[/quote]

It’s not that Moparcraft itself is dead, it’s that vanilla minecraft has started to become a dying breed. Modded minecraft such as FTB and tekkit seem to have dominated the scene as of late

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft Server [Bukkit 1.5.2] August 31, 2012
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:24, topic:447764”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=550652.msg4305019#msg4305019 date=1369634460]
Can you update this so I can play?
[/quote]

If you need advice on how to downgrade then we can provide you with some.[/quote]Already posted a way to downgrade a few posts up

[quote=“Travas, post:16, topic:447764”][quote author=KingClay link=topic=550652.msg4279126#msg4279126 date=1365296423]
is it updated to 1.5?
[/quote]Not yet, I’m afraid.

EDIT:

If you want to play, download this JAR: http://assets.minecraft.net/1_4_7/minecraft.jar
And follow these instructions:

  1. Close Minecraft.
  2. Go to Minecraft.jar. You can find this in Windows at %appdata%/.minecraft/bin.
  3. Copy your Minecraft.jar file and back it up somewhere else.
  4. Move the newly downloaded Minecraft.jar into the /.minecraft/bin folder, replacing the old version.
  5. Play[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft Server [Bukkit 1.5.2] August 31, 2012
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Updating the server to the latest Minecraft version takes a while as we have to wait for Bukkit to firstly release a recommended build of the server and then we have to wait for all the plugin dev’s to update the plugins so that they run on the latest updates. We could of course update the server on the beta builds of Bukkit and hope for the best but that could risk the world getting corrupt, people cheating and so on.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft Server [Bukkit 1.5.2] August 31, 2012
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:21, topic:447764”][quote author=xxx123xxx link=topic=550652.msg4305020#msg4305020 date=1369634503]

Can you update this so I can play?

You should consider downgrading lol
[/quote]

I used the download from this thread… 1.5.2 not 1.4.7[/quote]
You downloaded the cracked launcher which automatically downloads the latest version of minecraft. You need to download the 1.4.7 Jar file from http://assets.minecraft.net/1_4_7/minecraft.jar

Now to go start>run> and type “%appdata%” no quotes and a window should pop up, go to your minecraft folder >bin> and replace the minecraft.jar with the one you just downloaded

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft Server [Bukkit 1.5.2] August 31, 2012
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“KingClay, post:15, topic:447764”]is it updated to 1.5?[/quote]Not yet, I’m afraid.

EDIT:

If you want to play, download this JAR: http://assets.minecraft.net/1_4_7/minecraft.jar
And follow these instructions:

  1. Close Minecraft.
  2. Go to Minecraft.jar. You can find this in Windows at %appdata%/.minecraft/bin.
  3. Copy your Minecraft.jar file and back it up somewhere else.
  4. Move the newly downloaded Minecraft.jar into the /.minecraft/bin folder, replacing the old version.
  5. Play

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft Server [Bukkit 1.5.2] August 31, 2012
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

So I have edited my old launcher to run from a separate location (uses same saves/texture packs folders and such as default) just a few of the essential things will run from a separate location. Would this be worth releasing? This means that I could fully finish a custom updater script via PHP and such, meaning your moparcraft client would not need to be downgraded after each upgrade, but instead just update to a version moparcraft (or i) could host.

Pros:
[ul][li]Some client-sided mods could go into the “official” moparcraft update if they deem worthy.[/li]
[li]No need to downgrade all the time[/li]
[li]Can load your normal worlds and keep playing if necessary.[/li]
[li]Just as easy to use as official minecraft.[/li]
[li]Easier than ever to play.[/li][/ul]

Cons:
[ul][li]If a mod got pissed off he could release an update with a backdoor to a virus and nobody would know.[/li]
[li]No idea if your computer could handle the mods that go official.[/li]
[li]Problems for if mod was built for multicore and your on singlecore CPU[/li]
[li]Have to install your mods again (sorry).[/li][/ul]

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft Server [Bukkit 1.5.2] August 31, 2012
